The Legacy of La Panth√®re

The panther has been a symbol of the Cartier house since 1914, when Louis Cartier commissioned a painting titled "Dame √† la panth√®re" which featured a woman with a black panther at her feet. This iconic symbol has since become synonymous with Cartier's bold femininity. La Panth√®re Limited Edition pays homage to this heritage with its distinctive bottle and composition, making it more than a fragrance ‚Äì it's a collector's piece and a statement of refined taste.

When to Wear La Panth√®re Limited Edition

This new arrival is versatile enough for day-to-night wear but truly shines during evening occasions. Ideal for fall and winter, this limited edition fragrance will envelop you in warmth and sensuality. üí´

Frequently Asked Question

How does La Panth√®re Limited Edition differ from the original La Panth√®re?

While maintaining the distinctive gardenia-musk signature of the original, La Panth√®re Limited Edition features enhanced dried fruit notes and a more pronounced leather accord in the base. The collector's edition bottle also features unique artistic elements that make it a stunning addition to any fragrance collection. The gardenia note remains the star, but with a more sophisticated, multifaceted expression that elevates this limited edition to a true collector's item.
